doc:
Tom Bell (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Bell_(actor) 0 Thomas George Bell (2 August 1933 – 4 October 2006) was an English actor on stage, film and television. He was dark-haired and lean, and in his later years often played characters having a sinister side to their nature. Thomas_George_Bell ( 2_August_1933 – 4_October_2006 ) was an_English_actor on stage_,_film_and_television . He was dark-haired_and_lean , and in his_later_years often played characters having a_sinister_side to their_nature .
